edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo

Class AuthorAuthorCitation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.SparqlService
      • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo.VivoSparqlService
        • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo.Article
          • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo.Authorship
            • edu.northwestern.sonic.dataaccess.vivo.AuthorAuthorCitation

  • public class AuthorAuthorCitation
extends Authorship
    Wrapper for author-author citation; combines citation data from PubMed with authorship data from VIVO. Methods returning sets do the real work, methods returning arrays are for convenience
    Author:
    Hugh

        public NavigableSet<URI> getAuthorAuthorCitationFromSet(URI author)
        author-author citation; get the authors cited by an author; A -> X, given the left-hand side, find the right-hand side
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of an author
        Returns:
        set of URIs of authors cited by an author, empty if no citations

      • getAuthorAuthorCitation

        public NavigableSet<Integer> getAuthorAuthorCitation(URI authorFrom,
                                            Set<Integer> articlesTo)
        author-author citation; get the articles by one author that cite another author
        Parameters:
        authorFrom - URI of an author, the citing author
        articlesTo - set of PubMed ids of articles by the cited author
        Returns:
        set of PubMed ids of articles by authorFrom that cite articlesTo

        authorTo - URI of an author, the cited author

      • getHIndex

        public int getHIndex(URI author)
        Hirsh index; "A scientist has index h if h of his/her N papers have at least h citations each, and the other (N - h) papers have no more than h citations each." Hirsch, J. E. (15 November 2005). "An index to quantify an individual's scientific research output"; PNAS 102 (46): 16569ñ16572; arXiv:physics/0508025; Bibcode 2005PNAS..10216569H; doi:10.1073/pnas.0507655102; PMC 1283832; PMID 16275915
        Parameters:
        author - URI of an author
        Returns:
        h-index

      • getHIndex

        public int getHIndex(URI author,
            String keyword)
        Hirsh index; qualify the citing as well as the cited papers by a concept
        Parameters:
        author - URI of an author
        Returns:
        h-index
